config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalDiskSync configuration option is used in the journal() method to determine whether to enable disk synchronization for the PersistentJournal. If _journalDiskSync is true, disk synchronization is enabled, otherwise it is not.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalDiskSync configuration depends on the value set for it. If _journalDiskSync is set to true, disk synchronization will be triggered whenever a write operation is performed on the journal. If it is set to false, disk synchronization will not be triggered.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalDiskSync configuration option on the system can be significant. Enabling disk synchronization can ensure data durability but may also introduce performance overhead due to the synchronization process. Disabling disk synchronization may improve performance but at the cost of potential data loss in case of system failure.
